p.text: Responsive vs. Separate Mobile (or one site vs. dual sites)

"71% of mobile users expect mobile websites to load as fast, if not faster, than desktop websites, and 74% of mobile visitors will abandon a website if it takes more than 5 seconds to load."–Brad Frost
Frost, Brad. "Separate Mobile Website Vs. Responsive Website."
(1) Faletsky, Igor. "The Two Flavors of a 'One Web' Approach: Responsive vs. Adaptive."
(2) Williams, Tanya. "The difference between responsive and adaptive web design."
(possibly combined with lists and stepping) - move through vast amounts of content.
• Mobile browsers create a virtual viewport that is 980px wide.
jQuery.browser.mobile will be true if the browser is a mobile device
• As seen in common Framework templates
• Single Markup Juggling CSS and JS
(Except for the extra markup controlling hover)
• More power than JQuery, more control than CSS3
Try changing the Nav's position from off-screen left to off-screen right
• Calculate distances and reset on resize to solve orientation
Try changing the Nav's position from off-screen left to off-screen right
